body.name: Wireless Microphone Karaoke System with Rechargeable Bluetooth Receiver,Professional Handheld Dynamic Cordless Microphone,UHF 200 FT Range,6.5mm/3.5mm Output, for Singing Karaoke Speech
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 37 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 52 mins
features: Adjust microphone with echo/treble/bass/vol system:The wireless karaoke microphone set has echo, treble, bass Volume,Channel control button, you can experience different sound effects according to adjust the buttons of MIC，and you can change the different channle with channel button(.Support 10 sets at max)

Multiple Compatibility with 6.5/3.5mm Plug：professional wireless microphones come with 6.5mm (1/4") or 3.5mm (1/8") MIC Jack, insert the mic jack, not an aux/line in jack.Compatible with Party speaker, Singing machine, amplifier, PA system, audio interface, truck speaker system, Dome speaker system and more equipment with mic input.(Notice: Not For Phone, PC, Camera)

Long Working Time：the UHF rechargeable receiver of wireless microphone set built-in 1200 mAh lithium-ion batteries can offer about 8 hours working time and fully charged in 3 hours. the microphone have a battery box which recommend using 2 aa amazon alkaline batteries.(4 aa batter have included)

UHF Wireless Microphone: The dynamic microphone adopt fcc certified UHF frequency band,Up to 200 feet transmission distance, ,Signal Stability,no delay,anti-jamming, clear sound quality,and providing a larger flexibility in different scenes. Rechargeable Receiver with Bluetooth, when you Turn on the receiver, search for the Bluetooth name: X168, Play your music for karaoke .widely applied to Karaoke singing, Presentation, Speech, Outdoor Activities, Wedding, Stage Performance, Interviewand more.

High-quality Service:Our company is devoted to creating more perfect microphone ,keeping improving by continuously listen our customer’s requirements. You are welcomed to contact us if you have any problem. We will get back to you within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2019
reviews.reviewText: PROS: Big 18650 batteries are cheap and easily swap able if you pick up some extras- we have several for use in our tactical flashlights. there should be no issues with battery life for the intended use (non-professional). Sound is great. No drop outs walking around a LARGE meeting area 25' x 75'. I tried to find some fault in the sound but its good. No interference from the other mic or other devices in the room. Build quality is good, to reveal the battery chamber there is a plastic lower cover that screws off which is kind of thin but the upper portion where you grip the mic is metal. These come with wind covers to keep a clean speech.CONS: Two negative things; 1) THere is no way to monitor the level of charge to the battery in the receiver. The mics themselves have indication of battery level but not the receiver. However, there is a micro USB charging port that I plugged a phone charger into during use! 2) The mics are round. They missed the hex shape in the design that would have kept these from rolling off the podium. There is a rubber like sleeve that slips over the mic for this purpose but its not custom fit...its loose and flops down when you lift the mic. Seems like an afterthought. It can be slipped up into the windscreen area to a snug fit, maybe that is what was intended.I have to say, PRIME is way more dependable than UPS in my experience. I asked that these be delivered by 4PM on a Saturday when Amazon was telling me Sunday delivery. And they showed up right on time. Very impressed. All these "Guaranteed Deliveries" I have had lately that don't make it on time have me in doubt. UPS hasn't been forthright about packages, claiming the package was lost after "being out for delivery" for two days, then miraculously showing up 2 hours late. (TIme sensitive package that was rushed / guaranteed) So maybe Amazon knows what it is doing with their own trucks.

Apart from that excellent mics.Good for church, outside events, parties, and conferences..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2020
reviews.reviewText: These mics are just what I needed for my game room. We had the traditional wired mics in there but these are so much better! The mics feel nice in your hand and the quality was all i had expected and more. I really like that you can use them while they are charging. As soon as they arrived we wanted to check them out and were able to due to this feature. They charged quick and seem to hold charge really well. I am impressed with these and would recommend them.

reviews.reviewText: Stopped working 7 months after using the system on a weekly bases. Not worth it.
